body_html:
Actually, this is just the Docker VM running out of memory - increasing the memory from the Docker preferences resolves it.

Maybe it would be worthwhile to add a warning to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/docker/README.md.
body_text:
Actually, this is just the Docker VM running out of memory - increasing the memory from the Docker preferences resolves it.
Maybe it would be worthwhile to add a warning to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/docker/README.md.
body:
Actually, this is just the Docker VM running out of memory - increasing the memory from the Docker preferences resolves it.

Maybe it would be worthwhile to add a warning to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/docker/README.md.
